{"id":1133124691,"question_id":3267,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"8 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1704038899,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"511 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1133124691/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Longest Special Substring That Occurs Thrice I","memory":"124.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maximumLength(string s) {\n        map<string,long long int>mp;\n        for(int i=0;i<s.size();i++){\n            for(int j=i;j<s.size();j++){\n            string x;\n            x=s.substr(i,j-i+1);\n            mp[x]++;}\n        }\n        long long int count1=INT_MIN;\n        for(auto m:mp){\n            if(m.second>=3){\n            string h=m.first;\n            if(count(h.begin(),h.end(),h[0])==h.size()){\n            long long int o=h.size();\n            count1=max(count1,o);}}\n        }\n        if(count1!=INT_MIN){\n            return count1;\n        }\n        return -1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-longest-special-substring-that-occurs-thrice-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
